Name: Bang Trim
Details: This service includes a consultation and performed on dry hair
Prep instructions: Please provide an open space with great lighting

Name: Basic exterior Trim
Details: This service includes a consultation and performed on wet or dry hair
Prep instructions: Please do not wash your hair.  Your stylist will take care of all your hair needs.  We ask that you provide an open space with great lighting.

Name: Reshape
Details: This service includes a consultation and performed based on the desired shape

Name: Long Layered
Details: This long layered bob cut will be done with a point cutting technique, which will allow your hair to have a sophisticated flowy movement.

Name: Short layered
Details: This service is performed on dry or wet hair

Name: A Symmetrical
Details: This A Symmetrical Bob will be done as a blunt cut with feathered layers throughout the crown and nape
Prep instructions: Please provide an open space with great lighting
